snippet: After the Obama administration proposed moving the international food aid program out of the Agriculture Department, the Congressional Agriculture Committees took lesser actions.
abstract: Senate and House Agricultural Committees begin laying groundwork for their own changes to country's international food aid program after Obama administration proposes overhaul.
lead_paragraph: After the Obama administration proposed moving the international food aid program out of the Agriculture Department, the Congressional Agriculture Committees took lesser actions.

headline.seo: Congress Answers Obama Plan With Smaller Food Aid Changes
headline.main: As Obama Pushes Overhaul of Food Aid, Panels in Congress Favor Smaller Changes
headline.print_headline: As Obama Pushes Overhaul of Food Aid, Panels in Congress Favor Smaller Changes
